mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inspsitenum AS "inspsitenum", a.inspdate AS "inspdate", a.inspdisplay AS "inspdisplay", a.inspcmq AS "inspcmq", a.inspctq AS "inspctq", a.inspcuq AS "inspcuq", a.insppeople AS "insppeople", a.inspremarks AS "inspremarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_replace_checkinfo( id, inspsitenum, inspdate, inspdisplay, inspcmq, inspctq, inspcuq, insppeople, inspremarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inspsitenum}, #{inspdate}, #{inspdisplay}, #{inspcmq}, #{inspctq}, #{inspcuq}, #{insppeople}, #{inspremarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_replace_checkinfo SET inspsitenum = #{inspsitenum}, inspdate = #{inspdate}, inspdisplay = #{inspdisplay}, inspcmq = #{inspcmq}, inspctq = #{inspctq}, inspcuq = #{inspcuq}, insppeople = #{insppeople}, inspremarks = #{inspremarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
